verses.content: Aw Pathien, i rorêlnahai chu lal kuomah pe la, I felna chu lal naupa kuomah pe rawh.
I mihai chu felnain ro rêlpêk a ta, I mi rimsihai chu rorêlna felin ro rêlpêk a tih.
Tlâng lien le tlâng chînhai hin felnain Mihai kuomah lungmuongna hung intlun an tih.
Ama chun mi laia rimsihai chu ro rêlpêk a ta, Pase nauhai chu sandam a ta, Nêksâwrtu ruok chu suknâwi a tih.
Nisa khi a um sûng phawt chu ṭîng an ti cheh a, Thla um sûng po khawmin, suon um sûng po po chun.
Ama chu hlobet râwtna chunga ruotui tla angin tlâng a ta, Hnuoi châwmtu ruotui ang elin.
A dam lai chun mi felhai chu inno hlut hlut an ta, Thla um naw hma khat chun, lungmuongna nasatak um a tih.
Ama chun tuisuorieta inthawka tuisuoriet dang chenin ramawp nei a ta, Vadungpuia inthawka kâwlkawdawng chen khawmin.
Thlalêra umhai chu a hmaah kûn an ta, Ama dotuhai chun pilvut liek an tih.
Tarsis ram le thlierkâra lalhaiin lâwmman hung chawi an ta, Seba le Sheba ram lalhaiin thilpêk hung inhlân bawk an tih.
Anih, lal po po chu a hmaah bawkkhup an ta, Hnam tinrêngin a rawng bâwl an tih.
Pasiein a koin ama chun sanhim a ta, Mi rimsi ṭhangpuitu nei naw khawm chu sanhim a tih.
Mi rimsi le pasiehai chu lunginsiet a ta, Pasiehai hringna chu sandam a tih.
An hringna chu nêksâwrna le nunsietnaa inthawkin intlan a ta, An thisen chu ama ngai chun hlutak a ni ding a ni sih a.
Chun, hring an ta, Sheba ram rângkachak chu a kuoma pêk nîng a tih, Mihaiin ama chu ṭawngṭâipêk rawp an ta, Sûnnithlâkin mal sâwmpêk an tih.
Hnuoiah, tlâng chungahai hin bu tamtak um a ta, A vui chu Lebanon angin inhnîng suou suou a ta, Khuoa mihai chu hnuoi hlobet angin inno hlut hlut an tih.
A hming chu kumkhawtluongin dei naw nih a. A hming chu ama a um sûng chu dei loin um pei a ta, Mihai chu amaa chun malsâwmin um an ta, Hnam tinrêngin ama chu hamṭha tîng an tih,
LALPA Pathien, Israelhai Pathien chu inpâkin um raw se, Ama chau hin thilmak a thaw hlak a.
A hming ropuitak hi kumkhawtluongin inpâkin um bawk sienla, Hnuoi pumpui khawm hi a ropuinaa suksipin um raw se; Amen, Amen.
Jessai naupa David ṭawngṭâi- nahai chu a tâwp tah.
